text: @RandPaul @NYGovCuomo Why does Sen.Rand Paul stuck his foot in his mouth when he goes to tweet or does anything else interviews or anything. He doesn't realize that he is part of the problem because he has no idea that we have to come together in a Cooperative way to solve the covid-19 problem.
